metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000500 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Busybox contains a Missing SSL certificate validation vulnerability in The"busybox wget" applet that can result in arbitrary code execution. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via Simply download any file over HTTPSusing "busybox wget https://compromised-domain.com/important-file".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
busybox-static - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
udhcpc - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
udhcpd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.3').
